properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITE_DATE , NOTICE_NO FROM NOTICE
SELECT E.EVENT_TITLE , E.EVENT_NO , E.EVENT_START , E.EVENT_END , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM EVENT E JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(A.REF_NO = E.EVENT_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 7
SELECT ADMIN_QNA_NO , ADMIN_QNA_TITLE , ADMIN_QNA_DATE , ADMIN_ANSWER_YN , ADMIN_QNA_CONTENT FROM ADMIN_QNA WHERE ADMIN_QNA_WRITER = 'U' AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT O.OWNER_QNA_NO , O.OWNER_QNA_TITLE , O.OWNER_QNA_CONTENT , O.OWNER_QNA_DATE , O.OWNER_ANSWER_YN , A.ACCOMO_NAME FROM OWNER_QNA O JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(A.ACCOMO_NO = O.ACCOMO_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
